chapter.text: You duck behind a trashcan nearby,^500 able to watch as the janitor,^500 ready to fight,^500 takes out a large hunting knife from a holster on his side.^1500 The janitor glances to where you’ve hidden.^1500 You can see the uncertainty as his voice trembles.^1500 “Don't worry son,^500 I can still take ‘em.”
